Package ohos.media.common.sessioncore

Class AVCallerUserInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.media.common.sessioncore.AVCallerUserInfo

  • public final class AVCallerUserInfo
extends Object
    Provides user information of an application. You can use the information to check whether a user is from a trusted application. An AVCallerUserInfo instance is usually used in AVSession and AVBrowserService.
    Since:
    3
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Multimedia#MEDIA

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AVCallerUserInfo​(String callerPackageName, int callerPid, int callerUid)
      A constructor used to create an AVCallerUserInfo instance to check whether a user if from a trusted application.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AVCallerUserInfo

        public AVCallerUserInfo​(String callerPackageName,
                        int callerPid,
                        int callerUid)
        A constructor used to create an AVCallerUserInfo instance to check whether a user if from a trusted application.
        Parameters:
        callerPackageName - Indicates the application bundle name. This parameter cannot be null.
        callerPid - Indicates the application process ID.
        callerUid - Indicates the user ID.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Throws this exception if the application bundle name is null.
        Since:
        3

      • equals

        public boolean equals​(Object obj)
        Checks whether this AVCallerUserInfo instance equals the specified AVCallerUserInfo instance.

        Two instances are considered equal only when all of their input parameters (callerPackageName, callerPid, and callerUid) are the same.

        Overrides:
